duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop new features and infrastructure for the Nextdoor Android app, focusing on maintaining platform conventions and user experience.
Contribute to all aspects of the Android stack, including networking, analytics, experiments, modular app structure, and testing infrastructure.
Own key contributions to Nextdoor's Android product by implementing new features, analyzing impact through data analysis, and mentoring team members.
Participate in in-person Nextdoor events, trainings, off-sites, volunteer days, and team building exercises to contribute to the overall culture of the company.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
